snippet: Silvio Berlusconi, leader of Italy's main center-right party, on Saturday said he would continue to support an agreement sealed last month with center-left leader Matteo Renzi to reform the electoral law and the political system....

headline.print_headline: Italy's Berlusconi Says Still Backs Reforms Agreed With Renzi
headline.main: Italy's Berlusconi Says Still Backs Reforms Agreed With Renzi

lead_paragraph: Silvio Berlusconi, leader of Italy's main center-right party, on Saturday said he would continue to support an agreement sealed last month with center-left leader Matteo Renzi to reform the electoral law and the political system.
